templates.title: BALogsUI
templates.description: Grafana interface (an open source analytics & monitoring solution providing easy access (search, download) to the BillingAdmin logs)
templates.note: Please complete all the fields (like 'Elasticsearch URL') before installing the application. If you release is lower than mr100-2,mr101-1,mr103-0+ clean up 'NGINX*' and 'port' fields

env.name: ELASTICSEARCH_URL
env.label: Elasticsearch URL
env.description: The URL of the Elasticsearch instance where BA logs data is stored

env.name: DEFAULT_USER_LOGIN
env.label: Default user login
env.description: The default user login for the Grafana web interface, 4 characters or longer

env.name: DEFAULT_USER_PASSWORD
env.label: Default user password
env.description: TheThe default user password for the Grafana web interface, 4 characters or longer

env.name: DOMAIN_NAME_FOR_UI
env.label: Domain name for Grafana
env.description: The domain name of the server where Grafana is deployed (will be used to generate the SSL certificate)

env.name: NGINX_CERT_PATH
env.label: Nginx certificate path
env.description: Path to Nginx certificate. This field should be cleared up for releases lower than mr100-2,mr101-1,mr103-0+

env.name: NGINX_KEY_PATH
env.label: Nginx SSL key path
env.description: Path to Nginx SSL key. This field should be cleared up for releases lower than mr100-2,mr101-1,mr103-0+

env.name: NGINX_CFG_PATH
env.label: Nginx config path
env.description: Path to Nginx configuration file. This field should be cleared up for releases lower than mr100-2,mr101-1,mr103-0+

env.name: GRAFANA_PORT
env.label: Port for Grafana
env.description: Port for Grafana. This field should be cleared up for releases lower than mr100-2,mr101-1,mr103-0+

env.name: NGINX_PORT
env.label: Port for Nginx proxy
env.description: Port for Nginx proxy used to access Grafana. This field should be cleared up for releases lower than mr100-2,mr101-1,mr103-0+

templates.title: BALogsSupervisor
templates.description: The service for reindexing and removing old BillingAdmin logs stored in the Elasticsearch
templates.note: Please complete all the mandatory fields (like 'Elasticsearch Node') before installing the application

env.name: ES_NODES
env.label: Elasticsearch Node
env.description: The Elasticsearch master node (in the format '<IP_ADDR>:<PORT>') where logs will be saved

env.name: LOGS_CLEANUP_DAYS
env.label: Logs cleanup days
env.description: Delete logs that were saved more than N days ago

env.name: SUPERVISOR_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT_MIN
env.label: Processing timeout (minutes)
env.description: Try to delete/reindex logs every N minutes

templates.title: BALogsExporter
templates.description: The service for collecting logs from a BillingAdmin node and saving them in the Elasticsearch
templates.note: Please complete all the mandatory fields (like 'Elasticsearch Node') before installing the application

env.name: ES_NODES
env.label: Elasticsearch Node

env.name: EXPORTER_PROCESSING_TIMEOUT_SEC
env.label: Processing timeout (seconds)
env.description: Try to collect/save logs every N seconds

env.name: LISTEN_HTTP_IP
env.label: Service IP
env.description: Bind API gatewey service to this IP, to make it available via http

env.name: DB_IP
env.label: Database IP
env.description: IP for the porta-db-master hostname

env.name: REPLICAS
env.label: Number of PortaAdmin nodes
env.description: Ensure that service runs on every PortaAdmin node
